title: 4k League of Legends
body:
I only have a 4k monitor since I got rid of my older one when I got a new one.  I had no idea that it would make League too hard to play.  I can't even set it to 1080p without there being a host of problems.   If you see in the photo I attached, the health bars are insanely small, and as are the minimap icons.  The other thing that is bad, is the mouse cursor (which you can't see for some reason) is way too small.  

I'm not a developer so I can't say how hard it is, but it seems like it would be easy to give us a slide scale for mouse, health bar and minimap icons.  

I see people talking about it all the time, for once Riot please respond or do something.

replies.body: This resolution isn't currently supported and it may cause issues while playing.  It may be necessary to scale down, but I recommend[ submitting a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)to player support.  Our tech team can look into your specific case and find options best for you.

Well I appreciate the reply, but like I said I can't scale down.  The screen goes all the way to the right.  And the health bars, mini map and mouse cursor are not just my specific case.  It's like that for everyone.  This is something that needs to be fixed for everyone with 4k, not just me.

Yes... This is an issue for all 4k Players. I have scaled my game down to 1080p but this prevents me from playing in window mode because the window mode will not fill the 4k monitor. 

Basically if you want window mode, you need to play the game at 4k. The game is NOT playable at 4k.
Just to clarify -- are you not able to adjust the resolution of your monitor itself to 1920x1080?  I was under the impression that this is a temporary work-around but I might be mistaken.

This is why I'm hoping for a slider scale for some other things like mouse cursor and health bars.  I'm not asking for a total 4k overhaul.

Well. I just found this thread, and I recently got myself a nice 4k monitor as well. I don't have many real issues with the 3840x2160 resolution, besides the fact that the minion health bars (main issue for csing), and my pointer is insanely small. Other than that it's totally fine for me. I really hope that the health bar scaling, and mouse pointer scaling could at some point get fixed. That's all really. :)
